metadata.description: A vast, barren expanse of ash and cinder stretching as far as the eye can see. The skeletal remains of skyscrapers pierce the smog-filled sky like jagged teeth. Toxic fumes waft through the air, corroding lungs and souls.
metadata.significance: Birthplace of the Khaoskrieg, where the first great catastrophe ravaged the world and sparked a chain reaction of devastation.
